{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:31.000

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:43.000

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:44.000
    | text      = Not long after that homo sapiens could vanish from earth entirely in our own lifetimes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:53.000
    | text      = Now if Hitler wrote that you'd say he was even more of a madman
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:56.000
    | text      = But when it's James Lovelock
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:00.000
    | text      = The transhumanist environmentalist
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:04.000
    | text      = It's so sexy
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:05.000
    | text      = And where does James Lovelock go?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:08.000
    | text      = I looked it up
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:10.000
    | text      = James Lovelock has gone and spoken to the Albert Einstein Institute
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:14.000
    | text      = Oh
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:15.000
    | text      = And who was the ombudsman of that for the last 20 years?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Jeffrey!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:20.000

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:23.000
    | text      = Epstein!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:25.000
    | text      = Oh boy
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:26.000
    | text      = This is a hot start to the show
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:28.000
    | text      = This is weird
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:29.000
    | text      = So what Alex is talking about here is coverage of a new book
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:32.000
    | text      = That was written by noted futurist James Lovelock called Novacene
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:36.000
    | text      = In the book Lovelock argues that in the future cyborgs will become the dominant species of being in the universe
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:42.000
    | text      = These beings will be so far past us in terms of intelligence
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:45.000
    | text      = That they'd probably not even be interested in what we're doing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:47.000
    | text      = Kind of how a lot of people interact with plants
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:50.000
    | text      = It's all good and well to take issue with a futurist's prediction
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:53.000
    | text      = But it's an entirely separate thing to pretend that the role of a futurist in society
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:57.000
    | text      = Is to unveil the actual future
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:00.000
    | text      = As if they have some otherworldly psychic gift
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:03.000
    | text      = That's how Alex seems to think about futurists
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:06.000
    | text      = As if they're modern day soothsayers
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:08.000
    | text      = They aren't making predictions about trends they see in technology and culture
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:12.000
    | text      = But they're telling the world what is and what will definitively be
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:16.000
    | text      = Yeah he already has a trend guy
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:18.000
    | text      = And we've seen how well he does
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:20.000
    | text      = So anybody not him must be able to see the future
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:23.000
    | text      = It's a crazy way to think
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:26.000
    | text      = It's very nuts and beyond that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:28.000
    | text      = Very dumb
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:29.000
    | text      = Yes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:30.000
    | text      = In our endgame coverage we went over a bunch of the failed predictions
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:33.000
    | text      = Of Alex's other favorite futurist Ray Kurzweil
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:36.000
    | text      = So we don't need to repeat all that over again
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:38.000
    | text      = But suffice it to say his batting average is not great
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:41.000
    | text      = Most futurists' batting average is not great
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:44.000
    | text      = And that can also be said of James Lovelock
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:47.000
    | text      = He's most famous for his 1974 Gaia hypothesis
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:51.000
    | text      = Which stated that the Earth itself is a living organism that adjusts itself
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:55.000
    | text      = And has for millennia to make the environment suitable for life
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:59.000
    | text      = In the years since the Gaia hypothesis tons and tons of science
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:02.000
    | text      = Has come out to demonstrate how this view of the planet is fairly unsupported
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:06.000
    | text      = Or as the new scientist put it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:08.000
    | text      = The idea is quote beautiful but flawed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:11.000
    | text      = There are elements of the hypothesis that can be made to fit with understood science
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:15.000
    | text      = In as much as ecosystems can recover from some forms of damage that are done to them
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:19.000
    | text      = And that ecosystems are interdependent
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:22.000
    | text      = But the larger point he was making doesn't seem like it's grounded
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:25.000
    | text      = This is the largest contribution Lovelock had and has made to the culture
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:30.000
    | text      = And it's an idea that most scientists view as a fun thing to think about
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:34.000
    | text      = But completely off base scientifically
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:36.000
    | text      = There's no reason to not look at the predictions he's making now
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:39.000
    | text      = As a 100 year old man
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:41.000
    | text      = As equally idealistic and fun to contemplate
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:44.000
    | text      = But ultimately not that realistic
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:46.000
    | text      = Scientists have often said the same thing about the Expelliarmus charm
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:51.000
    | text      = It is very fun to think about but not necessarily scientifically helpful
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:56.000
    | text      = I'm guessing this is a Final Fantasy reference
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:59.000
    | text      = A Harry Potter reference, Dan!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:01.000
    | text      = Another thing I don't recognize as real
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:05.000
    | text      = Getting in there
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:08.000
    | text      = So one of the other things that I saw in terms of a criticism of his hypothesis
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:14.000
    | text      = Was that when it was refined later
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:18.000
    | text      = And he had some scientific criticism towards it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:23.000
    | text      = Then he refined his theory to make it more in line with the scientific understandings
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:28.000
    | text      = And once he really laid down what he was saying
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:32.000
    | text      = The response to it was like
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:34.000
    | text      = Well, what's new about this isn't accurate
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:37.000
    | text      = And what's accurate about this isn't new
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:39.000
    | text      = So there's almost like a non-futuristic aspect to it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:44.000
    | text      = And then the parts that are futuristic aren't really accurate
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:49.000
    | text      = Yeah, it's almost like scientific fanfic
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:52.000
    | text      = Sure
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:53.000
    | text      = And that's not to say anything against James Lovelock
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:56.000
    | text      = That's just the nature of this sort of futurist work
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:59.000
    | text      = These people are often never actually right about much
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:02.000
    | text      = But they present a compelling and romanticized version of things to come
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:05.000
    | text      = And even in their errors they often still latch onto a metaphorical truth about the times
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:10.000
    | text      = Which is easy to confuse with being right
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:12.000
    | text      = Alex is so desperate to present himself as correct about his theories
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:15.000
    | text      = That his enemies are trying to kill off the population
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:18.000
    | text      = That this is the sort of evidence he's willing to present
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:20.000
    | text      = Which should tell you how flimsy his shit is
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:23.000
    | text      = It's very flimsy
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:24.000
    | text      = That's not good
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:25.000
    | text      = Now, it's important to point out the other stuff he's talking about
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:30.000
    | text      = There's more than one Albert Einstein Institute in the United States
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:35.000
    | text      = One of them is a non-profit that bills itself as being dedicated to supporting non-violent resolutions of international crises
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:41.000
    | text      = Though it has been criticized by many as actually supporting efforts for US-backed regime change and sanctions
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:47.000
    | text      = Sure
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:48.000
    | text      = I'm not entirely sure if that's an accurate criticism without looking too deeply into it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:52.000
    | text      = But whatever the case is, it exists as a foreign policy entity that focuses on international conflict resolution
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:58.000
    | text      = And the other one is Albert Brooks' personal charity
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:01.000
    | text      = It is not
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:02.000
    | text      = The other Albert Einstein Institute is also known as the Max Planck Institute for Gravitational Physics
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:10.000
    | text      = That one sounds sciency
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:11.000
    | text      = These are unrelated entities
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:13.000
    | text      = That sounds obvious
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:14.000
    | text      = That just happen to have the same name
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:15.000
    | text      = What a dick move on the foreign policy one to be like, we're the Albert Einstein Institute
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:20.000
    | text      = Well, they did that because the guy who started it was inspired by Albert Einstein's non-violence ideology
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:27.000
    | text      = Yeah, yeah
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:28.000
    | text      = Whatever
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:29.000
    | text      = I looked into this, I can't find any real concrete connections between Epstein or either of these institutes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
